info.author: Google Inc.
info.description:
gcs-oauth2-boto-plugin is a Python application whose purpose is to behave as an
auth plugin for the boto auth plugin framework for use with OAuth 2.0
credentials for the Google Cloud Platform. This plugin is compatible with both
user accounts and service accounts, and its functionality is essentially a
wrapper around oauth2client with the addition of automatically caching tokens
for the machine in a thread- and process-safe fashion.
info.name: gcs-oauth2-boto-plugin-grow
info.summary: Auth plugin allowing use the use of OAuth 2.0 credentials for Google Cloud Storage in the Boto library.
info.html_description: gcs-oauth2-boto-plugin is a Python application whose purpose is to behave as an auth plugin for the boto auth plugin framework for use with OAuth 2.0 credentials for the Google Cloud Platform. This plugin is compatible with both user accounts and service accounts, and its functionality is essentially a wrapper around oauth2client with the addition of automatically caching tokens for the machine in a thread- and process-safe fashion.
